original_title: 【※注意！！人間不信※】窓清掃員NTR 俺は同僚だったあの野郎に嵌められ会社をクビ…窓清掃員として働いていた。不倫カップルが真っ昼間からじゃれあっているこのホテルも俺の担当だ。窓に背を向け男に跨り腰を振る女とその女を激しく抱く男…。そいつらの正体… 黒川すみれ
overview: I was laid off from my job and I was a window cleaner. I was held accountable for a big mistake. Hooked up with a former colleague. Her wife Sumire has been supporting me for such a long time. At the hotel I was in charge of, men and women who were regular customers were busy with sex from daytime. I couldn't see his face, but it was intense. The man and woman came to the suite today, and the moment they opened the curtains to show me off, everything in me fell apart...
title: Window Washing Cuckold Fucking My Colleague Set Me Up And I Got Fired… Sumire Kurokawa
